ygData.subject: Re: New Lambent Armor stats
ygData.msgSnippet: I know the feeling, I will no doubt be leaning on my husband to be, the soon to 40th level Paladin for a little assistance also...... Of course he doesnt know
ygData.messageBody:
I know the feeling, I will no doubt be leaning on my husband to be, the soon
to 40th level Paladin for a little assistance also...... Of course he doesnt
know this yet :)


Jaez
-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 1:07 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Lambent Armor stats


>From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>
>>And you had better get the stat info coming right away then. =)
>
>LOL - will do. It all depends on my level 40 druid friend who
>will no doubt be the key to acquiring half the items (with healing,
>teleports, kiting HGs, etc)
>
>In fact, I'll lay out my game plan:
>
>Order of Acquistion
>===================
>[Permafrost] Elite Goblin Guard for greaves. (if I dont fall alseep)
>[Qeynos] Purchase all jewels needed.
> 4 star rubies, 4 sapphires = ~700pp
> Get plat to pay off people for looting rights.
> Get gold to buy the 4 fire opals in the temple.
>[WestKarana] Choon/Froon for those rune thingies (top,middle).
>[NorthKarana] Grifenne stew! acquire the charm.
>[NorthKarana] Crush a few hill giants and 'fons for Lament Stones.
>
>circle: feerott.
>
>[Cazicthule] Fanatic in Tae 2nd floor for rune.
>
>circle: south ro.
>
>[Oasis] deepwater goblins for helm.
>[LowerGuk] Shin Knight (dead and live) for greaves and gloves.
>[LowerGuk] Gargoyles near the tower for carapace.
>
>circle: butcher.
>
>[Mistmoore] deathly usher for gloves, if bard hate doesnt kill me.
>[Mistmoore] Ugh, LotGP from the gypsies in the castle (Marrisa?)
> No way to get this without a level 40+ full group.
>[Unrest] I'm ashamed to say this, I've never been there.
> Someone said the dark bones are in the basement.
> Good thing, I need to get my friend some workboots.
>
>circle: lavastorm.
>
>[Solusek A] both the champion and mage, vambraces and boots.
>
>Enter temple of solusek ro, get pretty armor.
>
>This is all my plan of course, RL (work or girlfriend) may
>step in and shutdown everything =) And Lament Stones may be
>Lore, so I may have to make many trips. It's all up in the
>air until things are finalized.
>
>But it's still a good plan to go by.
>
>Harmonic Distortion, 39th unchained melody.
>League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
>< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
